## Description {#details}

Implements an expansion pass to turn <code>indirectbr</code> instructions in the IR into <code>switch</code> instructions.

This works by enumerating the basic blocks in a dense range of integers, replacing each <code>blockaddr</code> constant with the corresponding integer constant, and then building a switch that maps from the integers to the actual blocks. All of the indirectbr instructions in the function are redirected to this common switch.

While this is generically useful if a target is unable to codegen <code>indirectbr</code> natively, it is primarily useful when there is some desire to get the builtin non-jump-table lowering of a switch even when the input source contained an explicit indirect branch construct.

Note that it doesn&#39;t make any sense to enable this pass unless a target also disables jump-table lowering of switches. Doing that is likely to pessimize the code.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we need to replace any indirectbrs we need to establish integer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// constants that will correspond to each of the basic blocks in the function</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// whose address escapes. We do that here and rewrite all the blockaddress</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip blocks that aren&#39;t successors to an indirectbr we&#39;re going to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// rewrite.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!IndirectBrSuccs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a1f475b0df44ebd7169e720fa1bf9169e">count</a>(&amp;BB))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsBlockAddressUse = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &amp;U) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockAddressUseIt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac78c09ae232b2ce188ff590d51e3c268">llvm::find&#95;if</a>(BB.uses(), IsBlockAddressUse);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BlockAddressUseIt == BB.use&#95;end())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(std::find&#95;if(std::next(BlockAddressUseIt), BB.use&#95;end(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">                        IsBlockAddressUse) == BB.use&#95;end() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;There should only ever be a single blockaddress use because it is &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BA = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;BlockAddress&gt;</a>(BlockAddressUseIt-&gt;getUser());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip if the constant was formed but ended up not being used (due to DCE</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or whatever).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!BA-&gt;isConstantUsed())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the index we want to use for this basic block. We can&#39;t use zero</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because null can be compared with block addresses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BBIndex = BBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    BBs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;BB);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ITy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;IntegerType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getIntPtrType(BA-&gt;getType()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;BBIndexC = ConstantInt::get(ITy, BBIndex);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now rewrite the blockaddress to an integer constant based on the index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: This part doesn&#39;t properly recognize other uses of blockaddress</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expressions, for instance, where they are used to pass labels to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// asm-goto. This part of the pass needs a rework.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    BA-&gt;replaceAllUsesWith(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantexpr/#a02560cda155aaed54314383bed827d60">ConstantExpr::getIntToPtr</a>(BBIndexC, BA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
